agents.qoagent

Class AutomatedAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.qoagent.AutomatedAgent

  • public class AutomatedAgent
extends java.lang.Object
    The AutomatedAgent class represents the automated agent.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Raz Lin
    See Also:
    AutomatedAgentThread, AutomatedAgentMessages, AutomatedAgentCommunication, AutomatedAgentsCore, AutomatedAgentType
